intro.title: Full Stack Developer
intro.description: Passionate about creating web and mobile solutions that make a difference.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Learn a bit about my journey
about.bio: I am a full stack developer passionate about technology and innovation. I work with web and mobile development, creating efficient and intuitive solutions.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.intro: Here are some of the projects I've recently developed. Each project represents a unique challenge and a learning opportunity, using different technologies and approaches to create efficient solutions.

noarHealth.title: Noar Health
noarHealth.description: Health and wellness app, developed with React Native for Android and iOS. Allows users to track their health and access qualified professionals.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.description: My portfolio website developed with React, TypeScript and Styled Components. A project that showcases my skills and recent projects.

appnewssenado.title: News Portal
appnewssenado.description: A React Native news reader app with offline functionality, bookmarks, and a modern interface.
